item.description:
I am scheduling an after-cruise brunch at Salem Beerworks and then a trip to the Pirate Museum! Apparently the Pirate Museum doesn't take very long to see (about half an hour). Depending on time, I am open to other post-brunch suggestions. I was just at the Peabody-Essex Museum but didn't get to see it all.

You are welcome to join for either or both whether or not you do the cruise, but please only RSVP if you are definitely coming to brunch, because I will need to make a reservation.

Salem Beerworks:
http://www.beerworks....

Pirate Museum:
http://www.piratemuse...

The Newburyport/Rockport Commuter Rail goes to Salem from North Station.
http://www.mbta.com/s...

The Salem Trolley goes all around Salem for a $15 on-off ticket, including Mahi Mahi cruises and all the museums.
http://www.salemtroll...
item.name: Brunch at Salem Beerworks, then Pirate Museum!
